channel.title: Mail headers
channel.description:
X-IP-stats: Incoming Last 0, First 899, in=1750563, out=0, spam=0 ip=1.2.3.4 Status: U X-UIDL: 73
What do these headers mean? Do they have anything to do with bulk emailing?
